body.name: Candle Warmer Lamp with Dimmer, Electric Candle Warmer for Jar Candles, Bedroom Home Decor, 2H/4H/8H Timer Adjustable Height with 2 Bulbs, (Amber)

features: 【Ideal Home Decoration】 The design of this candle warmer lamp mainly consists of a wooden base, metal body, and vintage glass shade, making it suitable for all sizes of jar candles. It combines a table candle lamp warmer and aromatherapy, making it a perfect addition to modern and sophisticated bedroom decor, as well as living room decor.

【Adjustable Height and Convenience】 Our candle lamps feature adjustable height functionality, allowing you to easily adjust the candle's height based on different spaces and needs, ensuring the optimal visual effect and user experience. The electric candle warmer melts candles and wax from the top down, using a 50W GU10 halogen bulb for fast and efficient fragrance distribution.

【Timer and Dimming Options】 Candle warmer lamp with timer and dimming functions to meet your personalized needs. You can choose from 2H/4H/8H timer settings, as well as four different dimming options, allowing you to adjust the light's brightness for various occasions and moods.

【Safety and Environmental Friendliness】 We prioritize safety and environmental friendliness. Our candle warmer lamp for jar candles eliminates the fire hazards associated with open flames. Moreover, the lamp candle warmer uses low-energy heating bulbs, which reduces energy consumption and produces no smoke or waste, making it an environmentally friendly choice.

【Ideal for Holiday Gifting】 The Candle Warming Lamp Package includes one wax melting lamp and two GU10 halogen bulbs (50W). Our candle wax warmer makes a perfect gift for various holidays. Whether for family, gifts for women, gifts for mom, Valentines Day Decorations, friends, or colleagues, you can offer it as a thoughtful gesture for special occasions, bringing warmth and joy to their pleasurable moments.
body.description: Ignite Serenity with the Candle Warmer: No Flames, Just Scents Candle Warmer lamp is a practical and unique product that uses heat to melt candles, eliminating the need for flames and fire hazards. It releases delightful fragrances and provides a continuous aroma experience, saving costs and the hassle of replacing candles frequently. With its exquisite design, it adds both functionality and decoration, bringing warmth and romance to any space. Whether for personal relaxation, setting a romantic ambiance, or gifting to loved ones, the Candle Warmer offers a pleasant and unique experience. Let it enhance your daily life by filling your surroundings with fragrance and warmth, creating a cozy and tranquil environment.

Timer Dimmer Switch Three-time settings of 2/4/8 hours to save your mindDimmer: short press 4-speed dimming, long press step-less dimming Adjustable Height Compatible with candles of various types and sizesAdjustment height for candle warmer lamp lights between 11” and 15” Easy to Install and Use The bulb is easy to install, just align the angle and gently rotate it to install it successfullyDo not touch the bulb when using the product for heating.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 28, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Lit and Safe: My Candle Companion
reviews.reviewText: I've gotta spill the tea on this Candle Warmer Lamp with Dimmer – it's not just your average candle warmer, it's the ultimate blend of style, safety, and vibes!About the Looks: This lamp is pure aesthetic goals. The wooden base, metal body, and vintage glass shade? It's like the perfect decor piece that also makes your candles pop! And yup, it's a one-size-fits-all deal, so all your jars are welcome to the party. The adjustable height feature is a bonus. Plus, it's all about that top-down candle melt action – it spreads the fragrance like magic - and it seems like my candles last longer.My favorite feature: You can set a timer and dim the light (four different levels) to match your mood (and anyone close to me knows that I have MANY moods!).My OCD point: Safety's a big deal, and this warmer nails it. No more anxiety over open flames – it's all fire hazard-free. And those low-energy bulbs? Total eco-friendly vibes – no smoke or waste in sight. If there's one downside, it's that there are no hot firemen coming to the rescue. But hey, we can always fake-sigh about it, right? 😂Wrap up: the Candle Warmer Lamp with Dimmer is a solid player in the candle world. It's all about bringing style and safety to your space while keeping the candle vibes strong. If you're a candle addict like me, you NEED this lamp in your life – trust me, it's the real deal! 🕯️✨

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on October 29, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars super cute and a good product
reviews.reviewText: got this initially because the price was so much cheaper than other top-down candle warmers but it's such a delight to have!!! the light itself isn't terribly bright so it's not distracting to have on, it helps the candle scent spread fast (maybe not faster than actually lighting it's), and even helps it burn evenly. the only issue im having, but i didn't take off a star because it might not be the device's fault, is that the wax is burning above the wicks so the wick gets lost in the wax and it A CHORE to get it back. other than that, im satisfied

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 24, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars So cute and works amazing!!!
reviews.reviewText: This lamp is soooo cute and the perfect warm tone I was looking for. Amazing price and came with TWO bulbs!!! Would 100% buy again!

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 20, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Perfect ambience lighting
reviews.reviewText: It’s made of glass and looks so pretty!!! Exactly as described and works great

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on February 8, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Perfect to set up and forget about it!
reviews.reviewText: Love the look. Has a timer that works great! Adjust to multiple heights for many differnt candles.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on February 5, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Great candle warmer
reviews.reviewText: My wife loves this candle warmer. I lost my smell when I was 10 years old but my wife says it makes the house smell great, and it takes a really long time for the candle to completely melt. Weeks even if it's on 24/7. It also gives off a great amount of light, the controller portion has good functionality, timer 2, 4, 6 and I believe 8 hour timers, 4 light strength options which I find great before going to bed, I lower it 2 or 3 notches and it emits the perfect amount of light, at that point I click the 2 hour timer and don't have to worry about it. I think the quality is great and have had no issues with this thing. If you're looking for a candle warmer, I can recommend this one.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on December 2, 2023
reviews.reviewText: I was so excited for this product, it's a cute candle warmer compared to others on the market. I have seen this item go viral. You would imagine how shocked I was when I plugged it in for 5 seconds and the light bulb EXPLODED and shattered glass everywhere. In my shoes, ruined the candle and all in my carpet. I NEVER write reviews but this should come with safety goggles or life insurance if the light bulbs are going to explode within 5 seconds. and YES I followed the instructions.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 14, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Better than burning a candle!
reviews.reviewText: This was a Christmas present for my daughter and she was very excited to get it. She placed it on one of the tables in her living room and the light works very well. No more wasting candles as it only uses the light to activate the scent and the candle becomes solid again after each use. Plus, the aroma is just as strong as if you lit the candle. Will be ordering additional ones for my home as well!
